Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 27th overall pick, by San Francisco in 2011...
Injured on 6/18/2016 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/5/2017, off Dustin McGowan (LAN)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against San Diego on 4/7/2017...
Hit first career homerun on 4/17/2017, off Zack Von Rosenberg (NYN)...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against New York (A) on 7/22/2017...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 2017, hitting .306 with 7 HR, 78 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 2017...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 2018...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Milwaukee on 9/2/2019...
Traded from San Francisco to Washington on 4/10/2022 (Going to WSH: RF C. Tilson. Going to SF: 2B B. Herman Jr.)...
